title: France panorama. [No. 71/04]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The pleasure-boating salon - the 10th International Pleasure-Boating Salon in Paris. 2. The car of the year - International recognition for the GS Citroen. 3. Today’s moviemakers: Pierre Richard - portrait. 4. Paris by the “Express Route” - whizzing along the banks of the Seine. 5. Contemporary faces: Jules Romains - his latest work titled “Friends and Acquaintances”.
